title: Business Model Canvas Learning Design Utilizing Visual Metaphors (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic business concepts and familiarity with the business model canvas
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening business model design competencies applicable to workplace tasks for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 90% or more of the components of the Business Model Canvas by combining visual metaphors and textual explanations.
Learners can complete the Business Model Canvas using visual metaphors by analyzing real corporate cases through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can reduce cognitive load (mental workload) by 20% or more during post-learning assessments and apply 90% or more to actual business model design tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
